results.content: A great course for being introduced to the python language and then some. Parts of the course are somewhat outdated towards the end, but this is only a minor issue with solutions in the newer versions of the course book. It would have been nice to have been set programs to write with what has been taught.

results.content: Great course, only complaint is notes get lost when you typed them out in the text box and decide to maximize the screen to hide the lesson list. Very frustrating to have to retype notes. Other than that AMAZING.

results.content: Very good, a bit sad that last chapters had some tiny bit of oudated info like selenium and mail ones, but the course is still amazing !

results.content: From my coding position, thank you for such an useful and funny course!! The numerous examples make you try, find errors and most important: learn how to solve them to not get stuck and continue practising!
results.content_html: From my coding position, thank you for such an useful and funny course!! The numerous examples make you try, find errors and most important: learn how to solve them to not get stuck and continue practising!

results.content: I started by reading half of the book. It was very nice and the learning curve is excellent for someone like me, who does not really have any programming experience. Then, I saw that there was an online video module of the book, explained by the author. I am very happy with what I have learnt, and now I am way less scared of programming something. Thank you very much for the excellent content.

results.content: Such a great course as an intro to python programming. Al Sweigart does a wonderful job to explain things as you go along with the course. A truly awesome instructor. I most highly would recommend this course for total beginners to python and programming in general.
results.content_html: Such a great course as an intro to python programming. Al Sweigart does a wonderful job to explain things as you go along with the course. A truly awesome instructor. I most highly would recommend this course for total beginners to python and programming in general.

results.content: Excellent Course . I am a cyber security professional. Can you suggest me some projects that I should learn and work on as I see in many job openings a candidate requires to have skills in Automation using python. Thanks for this course . I will suggest this course to few of my friends they will also love it!

I will suggest this course to few of my friends they will also love it!

results.content: I had various mechanistic tasks to do quite frequently in my job, which require hundreds of clicks and mouse operations if done manually (e.g., Excel files, pdfs, and text files). Before this course, I was aware that these tasks could be automated with Python, but I did not know the relevant Python libraries that can do so (as there are so many possibilities, and some libraries are too complicated or limited). This course provided various practical examples and suggested libraries for achieving those tasks. I have already applied some of examples given in the course to my personal needs, and indeed, I have less boring, mechanistic tasks on my todos ... and my mouse hand is happier, too. I wish had taken this course sooner.
